notifications.title: Google Ads Policy Update Detected
notifications.description:
Google Ads policies
  
  
    Google provides translated versions of the Advertising Policies Help Center, though they're not meant to change the content of the policies. The English version is the official language used to enforce Google Ads policies. To view this article in a different language, u...
notifications.content:
Google Ads policies
  
  
    Google provides translated versions of the Advertising Policies Help Center, though they're not meant to change the content of the policies. The English version is the official language used to enforce Google Ads policies. To view this article in a different language, use the language dropdown at the bottom of the page.
  



  
  
    Display & Video 360 users must comply with this Google Ads policy. Visit the Display & Video 360 help center for additional restrict...

Google Ads policies
  
  
    Google provides translated versions of the Advertising Policies Help Center, though they're not meant to change the content of the policies. The English version is the official language used to enforce Google Ads policies. To view this article in a different language, use the language dropdown at the bottom of the page.
  



  
  
    Display & Video 360 users must comply with this Google Ads policy. Visit the Display & Video 360 help center for additional restrict...
requirements: Display & Video 360 users must comply with this Google Ads policy. Visit the Display & Video 360 help center for additional restrictions.
While most advertisers must be certified by Google, there may be limited circumstances where certification is not required.
We want consumers to have a good experience when they click on an ad, so ad destinations must offer unique value to users and be functional, useful, and easy to navigate.

updates.name: Google Ads
updates.title: Google Ads policies - Advertising Policies Help
updates.content:
Google Ads policies
  
  
    Google provides translated versions of the Advertising Policies Help Center, though they're not meant to change the content of the policies. The English version is the official language used to enforce Google Ads policies. To view this article in a different language, use the language dropdown at the bottom of the page.
  



  
  
    Display & Video 360 users must comply with this Google Ads policy. Visit the Display & Video 360 help center for additional restrict...

Google Ads policies
  
  
    Google provides translated versions of the Advertising Policies Help Center, though they're not meant to change the content of the policies. The English version is the official language used to enforce Google Ads policies. To view this article in a different language, use the language dropdown at the bottom of the page.
  



  
  
    Display & Video 360 users must comply with this Google Ads policy. Visit the Display & Video 360 help center for additional restrict...
requirements: Display & Video 360 users must comply with this Google Ads policy. Visit the Display & Video 360 help center for additional restrictions.
While most advertisers must be certified by Google, there may be limited circumstances where certification is not required.
We want consumers to have a good experience when they click on an ad, so ad destinations must offer unique value to users and be functional, useful, and easy to navigate.

updates.name: Meta Ads
updates.title: Introduction to the Advertising Standards | Transparency Center
